description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In a post-apocalyptic future, the only way to save the world is by hitting balls with a paddle.  Keep balls alive as long as you can to get the highest score and maybe a pony.
description.short: In a post-apocalyptic future, the only way to save the world is by hitting balls with a paddle.  Keep balls alive as long as you can to get the highest score and maybe a pony.
